dn32:1.3: gijjhakūṭaṃ pabbataṃ obhāsetvā → gijjhakūṭaṃ obhāsetvā (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed) | mahārājā → mahārājāno (mr)
dn32:3.2: ca → cakāro bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed potthakesu
dn32:3.6: ca → cakāro bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed potthakesu
dn32:3.12: ca → cakāro bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed potthakesu
dn32:3.16: dhammaṃ desesi → dhammamadesesi (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed); dhammaṃ deseti (?)
